about_the_game:
NEW: NOW INCLUDES LEVEL EDITOR!

Create your own mind bending puzzles with Q.U.B.E. Create and share them in the Steam Workshop, included free with Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary!


Serving as the ultimate celebration of a decade’s worth of brain-twisting first-person action, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary adds refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to a fresh take on the classic puzzler entirely rebuilt from the ground up.

The new chapter - dubbed Sector 8 - offers an additional 4-6 hours of gameplay, adding fresh content to an anniversary edition that will also allow players to take on either the original 2012 version of the game, or 2014’s Director’s Cut complete with its voice-over narrative and revised soundtrack - both with Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary’s stunning new visuals.

Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary features:


  • Q.U.B.E. - The original - The 2012 version of the game with improved visuals, new puzzles and gameplay tweaks from player feedback.
  • Q.U.B.E. Director’s Cut - The 2014 version of the game with a voice-over narrative and revised soundtrack.
  • Over 100 puzzles to complete across 8 levels
  • Sector 8 - A whole new chapter to the game, unlocked after completing the campaign. This provides 4-6 hours of brand new puzzle gameplay
  • Fresh visuals, with the game entirely rebuilt from the ground up
  • 46 Collectibles to track down across 8 levels
  • Full colour blind support, using symbols as a colour aid
  • Brand New Developer Commentary - The dev team reminisces about how they made the game.
  • Assorted Extras - Screenshots, concept art, and other trinkets from the making of the game.
  • RTX and DLSS support.
  • Includes Q.U.B.E. Create level editor!

Q.U.B.E. Create includes the following:

  • Duplicate objects easily
  • Translate, Rotate, and Scale objects!
  • Select objects via an Object List!
  • Select from categories: Puzzle, Geometry, Props, Lights
  • Puzzle elements ranging the entire franchise!
  • Steam Workshop integration!
  • Attach, connect, and activate objects!
  • Change their properties!
  • Select level music!
  • Change world lighting
  • PLAYER DEATH!
  • Physics Bot!
detailed_description:
Join the Q.U.B.E. Discord!


RTX AND DLSS ENABLED!


Q.U.B.E. Create included!

Create, share, and play custom levels with the in-game sandbox level editor!


About the Game

NEW: NOW INCLUDES LEVEL EDITOR!

Create your own mind bending puzzles with Q.U.B.E. Create and share them in the Steam Workshop, included free with Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary!

  • Assorted Extras - Screenshots, concept art, and other trinkets from the making of the game.

  • Includes Q.U.B.E. Create level editor!

  • Change world lighting
  • PLAYER DEATH!
  • Physics Bot!

name: Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD R9 290X series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 CPU @ 3.10GHz 3.50GHz or later
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

reviews:
“I'm utterly in love with what I've just experienced. Q.U.B.E. has been my best gaming experience so far this year hands down”
10 – Gaming Sandbox

“Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is an absolute must play game, particularly if you enjoy puzzle games. Regardless of whether you’ve played the original or not, this experience is worth checking out, as the added story and extra puzzles afterwards make it an entirely different experience.”
10 – The Gaming Outsider

“Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is a fantastic puzzle game that anyone at all interested in these type of puzzle games should really check out.”
9 – Geeky Hobbies
short_description: Entirely rebuilt from the ground up, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
